data.about: ⚡ A Tech Geek interested in automating tasks using python, trying out new technologies with a thirst for solving everyday problems using programming
data.about1: ⚡ I have experience in Data Engineering and Azure Delta lake on creating an end to end data architecture starting from data analysis -> data transformation (Azure Synapse / Databricks) -> data visualization (Power BI). I am also an aspiring full stack developer and worked with Fast API for backend and React JS/ Native for front end web/mobile
